item.description: Hey Kids! Roll up your sleeves! Join us for a fun interactive baking class. This time we will be baking Hamantashen from scratch. Learn the ins and outs of making the perfect hamantashen, with all different kinds of fillings! This class is for children of all ages. Ages 2 and up Fee: 5$ per person

group.name: mommy and me with a Jewish twist

item.name: Kids In The Kitchen- Purim Edition
